parameter.definition: Spacing between padding points [um]
parameter.label: Padding Spacing [um]

parameter.definition: Upper-bound coordinate for domain padding
parameter.label: Upper-bound Domain Padding

parameter.definition: Variance of point spread function in X direction
parameter.label: PSF X Variance

parameter.definition: Type of visualization
parameter.label: Visualization Type

parameter.definition: Variance of point spread function inY direction
parameter.label: PSF Y Variance

parameter.definition: Second scan line offset parameter (Y if scan axis is Z, Z if scan axis is X or Y) [um]
parameter.label: Offset #2 [um]

parameter.definition: Size of mesh domain in X direction [um]
parameter.label: Mesh domain size (X) [um]

parameter.definition: Brief description of the visualization
parameter.label: Description

parameter.definition: Resting Ca2+ concentration [uM]
parameter.label: Resting Ca2+ [uM]

parameter.definition: Total number of scans to simulate
parameter.label: Number of scans

parameter.definition: First scan line offset parameter (Y if scan axis is X, X if scan axis is Y or Z) [um]
parameter.label: Offset #1 [um]

parameter.definition: Axis along which to perform line scans
parameter.label: Scan Line Axis

parameter.definition: Target job file
parameter.label: Job File

parameter.definition: Simulation's grid output file base path/name
parameter.label: Grid file base

parameter.definition: Length per pixel for fluorescence scans [um]
parameter.label: Spatial Fluorescence Resolution [um]

parameter.definition: Lower-bound coordinate for domain padding
parameter.label: Lower-bound Domain Padding

parameter.definition: Starting coordinate for scan
parameter.label: Scan Start Position

parameter.definition: Ending coordinate for scan
parameter.label: Scan End Position

parameter.definition: Length per pixel for Ca2+ concentration profile [um]
parameter.label: Spatial Ca2+ Resolution [um]

parameter.definition: Size of mesh domain in Y direction [um]
parameter.label: Mesh domain size (Y) [um]

parameter.definition: Size of mesh domain in Z direction [um]
parameter.label: Mesh domain size (Z) [um]

parameter.definition: Variance of point spread function in Z direction
parameter.label: PSF Z Variance

parameter.definition: Title of visualization
parameter.label: Title

parameter.definition: Number of grid files that correspond to a single scan (determines temporal resolution, e.g. if grid output interval is 1.0ms and files per scan is 2, then each scan will correspond to 2.0ms)
parameter.label: Grid files per scan

parameter.definition: Baseline fluorescence signal (resting Ca-Fluo4n concentration)
parameter.label: F0
